action_upgrade_base_attack_quick.name: Quick Base Attack
action_upgrade_base_attack_quick.description: Allows the Base Attack action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_dodge_quick.name: Quick Dodge
action_upgrade_dodge_quick.description: Allows the Dodge action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_brace_quick.name: Quick Brace
action_upgrade_brace_quick.description: Allows the Brace action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_fortify_quick.name: Quick Fortify
action_upgrade_fortify_quick.description: Allows the Fortify action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_aim_quick.name: Quick Aim
action_upgrade_aim_quick.description: Allows the Aim action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_empower_quick.name: Quick Empower
action_upgrade_empower_quick.description: Allows the Empower action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_refine_quick.name: Quick Refine
action_upgrade_refine_quick.description: Allows the Refine action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_assist_quick.name: Quick Assist
action_upgrade_assist_quick.description: Allows the Assist action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_assist_enhanced.name: Enhanced Assist
action_upgrade_assist_enhanced.description: Range increased to 15 spaces and you can target multiple allies up to your Communication or Intelligence score.

action_upgrade_carry_quick.name: Quick Carry
action_upgrade_carry_quick.description: Allows the Carry action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_carry_enhanced.name: Effortless Carry
action_upgrade_carry_enhanced.description: No movement speed penalty. Once you've taken this action once on a turn, you can continue to reuse it for free until the end of this turn.

action_upgrade_protect_quick.name: Quick Protect
action_upgrade_protect_quick.description: Allows the Protect action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_protect_enhanced.name: Guardian
action_upgrade_protect_enhanced.description: You can protect all adjacent allies simultaneously and gain extra reactions equal to half your Tier (rounded up) to use only for the Protect Action.

action_upgrade_use_quick.name: Quick Use
action_upgrade_use_quick.description: Allows the Use action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_hasten_quick.name: Quick Hasten
action_upgrade_hasten_quick.description: Allows the Hasten action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_hide_quick.name: Quick Hide
action_upgrade_hide_quick.description: Allows the Hide action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.

action_upgrade_prepare_quick.name: Quick Prepare
action_upgrade_prepare_quick.description: Allows the Prepare action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
